threepio.engine
Class ThreepioEngine

java.lang.Object
  threepio.engine.Engine
      threepio.engine.ThreepioEngine
Direct Known Subclasses:
MotrEngine
public class ThreepioEngine
extends Engine

The ThreepioEngine class is the high-level processor for XML/BBF Data Model processing and diffing. It should be controlled by a separate UI, like ThreepioFrame.

Author:
jhoule
See Also:
TRminatorGUI

Method Detail

getMissingDepends

public java.lang.String getMissingDepends(java.lang.String path,
                                          java.lang.String modelName)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
gets a list of missing depdendencies (files) for a model, in a file.

Parameters:
path - - the path for the file to use.
modelName - - the model to get the files for.
Returns:
a string of file paths, one per line.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - - when files are not found or there is an IO error.

printModelTable

public boolean printModelTable(ModelTable table,
                               java.io.File fileOut,
                               boolean diff,
                               boolean profiles,
                               boolean looks)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
Prints a table much like printTable, but adds references and Profiles, if found.

Specified by:
printModelTable in class Engine
Parameters:
table - - the table to print.
fileOut - - the file to print out to.
diff - - a boolean that determines wether or not diffing information shoud appear on output.
profiles - - tells it whether to append a table of Model items from doc(s)
looks - - if the table should be formatted to have everything fit nicely on a page or webpage or not.
Returns:
true if the table printed alright.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - - when something goes wrong in printing.
